import json
async def solve():
    """Find how much Anmol Singh paid for his DLF apartment via Capbridge."""
    search_results = [
        "Found 5 search results:

1. A fancy house for Mr Jaggi: All about the Gensol promoter's DLF ...
   URL: https://www.livemint.com/companies/news/a-fancy-house-for-mr-jaggi-all-about-the-gensol-promoter-s-dlf-camellias-flat-11744893434456.html
   Summary: Apr 17, 2025 ... The 7430 sq ft super luxury flat in The Camellias at Gurugram was bought for an agreement value of \u20b937.92 crore by Anmol Singh Jaggi,\u00a0...

2. Gensol and BluSmart promoter Anmol Singh Jaggi diverted EV ...
   URL: https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/gensol-and-blusmart-promoter-anmol-singh-jaggi-used-loans-for-buying-evs-to-purchase-a-dlf-camellias-flat-12995674.html
   Summary: Apr 16, 2025 ... ... Anmol Singh Jaggi diverted EV loans to purchase a DLF Camellias flat: SEBI ... Capbridge then transferred Rs 42.94 crore to real-estate giant DLF.

3. DLF Camellias flat, \u20b96 crore to mother: How Gensol's Anmol Singh ...
   URL: https://www.hindustantimes.com/trending/dlf-camellias-flat-rs-6-crore-to-mother-how-gensol-s-anmol-singh-jaggi-diverted-company-funds-101744768926197.html
   Summary: Apr 16, 2025 ... ... Capbridge Ventures \u2013 a firm controlled by promoter Anmol Singh Jaggi \u2013 to finance the purchase of a luxury apartment in DLF Camellias. Jaggi\u00a0...

4. DLF Camellias twist: How did Gensol promoter use company funds ...
   URL: https://www.indiatoday.in/business/story/dlf-camellias-anmol-singh-jaggi-how-did-gensol-promoter-use-company-funds-to-buy-ultra-luxury-home-2709702-2025-04-16\n   Summary: Apr 16, 2025 ... ... apartments, prices for these upscale homes begin at Rs 70 crore ... apartment by Jasminder Kaur, the mother of Anmol Singh Jaggi. This\u00a0...

5. Golf set, luxury flat, personal travel: Anmol Singh Jaggi's lavish life ...
   URL: https://www.storyboard18.com/how-it-works/golf-sets-camellias-and-graft-anmol-singh-jaggis-lavish-life-on-gensols-dime-62404.htm\n   Summary: Apr 16, 2025 ... ... Capbridge Ventures, a firm controlled by Anmol Singh Jaggi. ADVERTISEMENT. In the lush greens of DLF Camellias\u2014one of Gurgaon's most opulent\u00a0...
"
    ]
    
    amount1 = "Rs 42.94 crore"
    
    if amount1:
        return f"FINAL_ANSWER: Capbridge transferred Rs 42.94 crore to real-estate giant DLF for Anmol Singh Jaggi's DLF Camellias flat."
    else:
        return "FINAL_ANSWER: Information about the exact amount Anmol Singh paid via Capbridge is not found."

tool_result.result: FINAL_ANSWER: Capbridge transferred Rs 42.94 crore to real-estate giant DLF for Anmol Singh Jaggi's DLF Camellias flat.
